entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 30%
